profile.name: Hynek Schlawack
profile.headline: Senior Software Engineer at Variomedia AG
profile.summary: Highly motivated and experienced software engineer with a strong passion for Python, security, and performance optimization. Proven track record of contributing to open-source projects and delivering high-quality solutions.

experience.title: Senior Software Engineer
description: Developed and maintained multiple large-scale Python applications using SQLAlchemy, Dash, and Argon2.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to design and implement scalable architecture for high-performance data processing pipelines.
Conducted regular security audits and implemented measures to improve the overall security posture of the organization.

experience.title: Freelance Developer
description: Developed multiple web applications using Python, Django, and React.js for various clients.
Conducted code reviews and ensured adherence to best practices and coding standards.

experience.title: Open Source Maintainer
description: Contributed to the development of multiple open-source projects, including SQLAlchemy and Dash.
Ensured code quality, security, and maintainability through regular reviews and testing.

experience.title: Erlang Developer
description: Developed multiple Erlang applications for various clients.
Collaborated with teams to design and implement scalable architecture for high-performance systems.
